ou
Class OUColour

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Color
      ou.OUColour
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Paint, java.awt.Transparency, java.io.Serializable
public class OUColour
extends java.awt.Color

Extends java.awt.Color to include an improved toString() method and static colours BROWN and PURPLE.

See Also:
Serialized Form

parseOUColour

public static OUColour parseOUColour(java.lang.String colour)
Return the OUColour represented by the String colour.

Parameters:
colour - the String representing an OUColour
Returns:
the OUColour represented by the String colour, else null if colour cannot be converted to an OUColour.
